DOC.brief_summary: The aim investigate whether strength training high intensity interval training effective improve insulin sensitivity , cardiovascular outcome , body composition reproductive outcome woman Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) . Few study examine effect strength train alone insulin sensitivity , reproductive outcome body composition woman PCOS . Most previous study aerobic exercise PCOS apply moderate exercise intensity .
DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Interval Training Strength Training Women With Polycystic Ovary Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Women Age 1845 year old PCOS Regular high intensity endurance strength training ( two time per week vigorous exercise ) . Concurrent treatment ( insulin sensitizer drug know affect gonadotropin ovulation , wash period 1 month prior inclusion ) . Ongoing pregnancy .
